channel.title: Posts on Stéphane Delbruel
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Stéphane Delbruel

item.title: Last Event
item.description: We will present our work on the first distributed federation for LoRaWAN actors at EWSN 2020, aimed at improving scalability and tackling contention by establishing a de facto collaborative behaviour between gateways, thus allowing free roaming capabilities without preliminary agreements. Our PoC can be found here: FLIP.
